data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fontoura, Paulo, Pilato, Giovanni (2007): Diphascon (Diphascon) faialense sp. nov. a new species of Tardigrada (Eutardigrada, Hypsibiidae) from the Azores and a key to the species of the D. pingue group. Zootaxa 1589: 47-55, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.178534
